mapper.insert: insert into tb_like values (#{qnaNo}, #{userNo}, (select code_value from tb_codenm where code_name='질문답변게시판'))

select * from ( select rownum numrow, aa.* from ( select * from (select q.*, (select user_id from tb_user u where q.user_no = u.user_no) user_id from tb_qna q) where qna_title like '%' || #{qnaKeyword} || '%' or qna_content like '%' || #{qnaKeyword} || '%' or user_id like '%' || #{qnaKeyword} || '%' order by qna_reg_dt desc) aa) where numrow between (#{qnaListCount}-6) and #{qnaListCount}
